channel.title: Misthalin | New Project LF Coders & Webdevelopers | Paying for your work!
channel.description:
I'll just make this short since I can't be bothered typing a novel right now.
[u][i][b]I'm being sponsored by a hosting company whom I've worked with earlier, they'll provide me with a free host for the first 3 months.[/b][/i][/u]
They are aware of what I'm capable of doing and therefor they decided to grant me a free host, the rent for that hosting service would normally cost 90$ per month. They've faith in me and I'm more than sure that with some qualified peoples I'll be able, we'll be able, to make something huge.
I've made several successful Runescape private servers in my past, my last one was called Misthalin - The Kingdom.
Observe: That server had it start in June 2010 and went active for at least 1 year before I decided to shut it down due to lack of willing-to-work staff!
I'm graduating from a technical gymnasium this summer and I've a lot of knowledge regarding most types of coding, including web-development but I'm not interested of doing all the work my self.
[u][i][b]I'm looking for:[/b][/i][/u]
5 coders.
3 web developers.
I'm not looking for moderators nor admins right now.
This is a serious project and I'm without any doubt sure that I'm able to make a 317 server in top 3 of all Toplists.
My server Misthalin was ranked 1st server for about 1 year in a row, on several ranking sites and we had a lot of users.
I'm looking for a large staff group, a serious group of people to do this project with. I'm not doing this to make money, it's a hobby for me.
I've also ran several other successful gaming servers during the years. Including Runescape, WoW, PWI, Aion and minecraft.
I've never failed and I won't do it this time either, I'm an experienced leader and I do know how to advertise and get players etc.
Soo... Does this sound good to you?
[u][i][b]Add my skype: bobbyp95[/b][/i][/u] Make sure you're adding the swedish one.
Age requirement: 16+ (Can be overlooked if you're good at what you're doing & if you're mature enough to handle the responsibility) Be able to speak proper english. Be dedicated to the project!
You'll be rewarded a moderator/admin position in-game.
I'm not looking for young unexperienced staff members, be mature and be willing to spend time. Lets make something huge together!
[u][i][b]Misthalin - The kingdom, we're bringing it back![/b][/i][/u]

item.title: Misthalin | New Project LF Coders & Webdevelopers | Paying for your work!
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Payments are not acceptable on this forum as it is against the rules, also please get your link verified by a global mod before posting it again.

Read full topic
item.source: Misthalin | New Project LF Coders & Webdevelopers | Paying for your work!

item.title: Misthalin | New Project LF Coders & Webdevelopers | Paying for your work!
item.dc:creator: @Rs3advanced Rs3advanced
item.description:
@Rs3advanced wrote:

I have joined the group, I am looking forward to seeing this project through and I hope I can be of the most help possible. This is a great idea, so far I love the sound of it and I cannot wait to be apart of the team that creates it. For those of you interested, get ahold of Bobby and if you feel the need to you may also contact me via Skype, my username is “Justehn”.

Read full topic
item.source: Misthalin | New Project LF Coders & Webdevelopers | Paying for your work!

item.title: Misthalin | New Project LF Coders & Webdevelopers | Paying for your work!
item.dc:creator: @neokairo neokairo
item.description:
@neokairo wrote:

I’ll just make this short since I can’t be bothered typing a novel right now.

I’m being sponsored by a hosting company whom I’ve worked with earlier, they’ll provide me with a free host for the first 3 months.

They are aware of what I’m capable of doing and therefor they decided to grant me a free host, the rent for that hosting service would normally cost 90$ per month. They’ve faith in me and I’m more than sure that with some qualified peoples I’ll be able, we’ll be able, to make something huge.

I’ve made several successful Runescape private servers in my past, my last one was called Misthalin - The Kingdom.

Observe: That server had it start in June 2010 and went active for at least 1 year before I decided to shut it down due to lack of willing-to-work staff!

I’m graduating from a technical gymnasium this summer and I’ve a lot of knowledge regarding most types of coding, including web-development but I’m not interested of doing all the work my self.

I’m looking for:

5 coders.

3 web developers.

I’m not looking for moderators nor admins right now.

This is a serious project and I’m without any doubt sure that I’m able to make a 317 server in top 3 of all Toplists.

My server Misthalin was ranked 1st server for about 1 year in a row, on several ranking sites and we had a lot of users.

I’m looking for a large staff group, a serious group of people to do this project with. I’m not doing this to make money, it’s a hobby for me.

I’ve also ran several other successful gaming servers during the years. Including Runescape, WoW, PWI, Aion and minecraft.

I’ve never failed and I won’t do it this time either, I’m an experienced leader and I do know how to advertise and get players etc.

Soo… Does this sound good to you?

Add my skype: bobbyp95
Make sure you’re adding the swedish one.

Age requirement: 16+
(Can be overlooked if you’re good at what you’re doing & if you’re mature enough to handle the responsibility)
Be able to speak proper english.
Be dedicated to the project!

You’ll be rewarded a moderator/admin position in-game.

I’m not looking for young unexperienced staff members, be mature and be willing to spend time. Lets make something huge together!

Misthalin - The kingdom, we’re bringing it back!

Read full topic
